```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

#### June 2023 (v 1.1.0)

Feature chapters added:

```{r, results='asis'}
readxl::read_xlsx("data/contributors.xlsx") |> 
  filter(!is.na(id),
         version == "1.1.0") |> 
  mutate(line = str_c("- ", title, " (", author, ")\n")) |> 
  pull(line) |> 
  cat()
```
